mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET cnt=#{cnt}, price=#{price} WHERE reserveno = #{reserveno}
mapper.select: select o.reservedate, o.reservetime, m.menuname, s.storename, r.price from reserve r inner join orderlist o on o.orderlistno = r.orderlistno inner join menu m on m.menuid = r.menuid inner join store s on s.storeid = m.storeid where o.custid = #{custid}
